metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4472 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Off-by-one error in the READ_ENCINT macro in chmd.c in libmspack before 0.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted CHM file.

criterions.comment: libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
